<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     OverloadType dx.op.&lt;opclass&gt;.&lt;return-type&gt;(int opcode, &lt;param types&gt;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &lt;param-types&gt; are constructed from types in Prop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334" lineLink="#acc8e6bea7e5502aec0248a1441e9b720"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42;<a href="#acc8e6bea7e5502aec0248a1441e9b720">getDXILOpFunctionType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#ac64683c1985c78d81b50819a0b733f48">dxil::OpCode</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#ac64683c1985c78d81b50819a0b733f48">OpCode</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  case OpCode:                                                                 \\</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Get index of the property from PropList valid for the most recent</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// PropList is expected to be sorted in ascending order of DXIL version.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(ArgIndex) &gt;= Args.size())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#a22a5df2ccfebeb3582950ac081af7057">makeOpError</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#ac64683c1985c78d81b50819a0b733f48">OpCode</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Wrong number of arguments&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OverloadTy = Args&#91;ArgIndex&#93;-&gt;getType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42;DXILOpFT =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#acc8e6bea7e5502aec0248a1441e9b720">getDXILOpFunctionType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#ac64683c1985c78d81b50819a0b733f48">OpCode</a>, M.getContext(), OverloadTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;size&#95;t&gt; OlIndexOrErr =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a3030fa8e5d4a78aef7c5a7fa00294ac6">getPropIndex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(Prop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/opcodeproperty/#a0f83da7b421403e184326cad9c02a2de">Overloads</a>), DXILVersion);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!OlIndexOrErr.has&#95;value())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#a22a5df2ccfebeb3582950ac081af7057">makeOpError</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#ac64683c1985c78d81b50819a0b733f48">OpCode</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;No valid overloads for DXIL version &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   DXILVersion.getAsString());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint16&#95;t ValidTyMask = Prop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/opcodeproperty/#a0f83da7b421403e184326cad9c02a2de">Overloads</a>&#91;&#42;OlIndexOrErr&#93;.ValidTys;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OverloadKind Kind = <a href="#a6b04886780c4fb4764f2b6dbc1d3d2d9">getOverloadKind</a>(OverloadTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the operation supports overload types and OverloadTy is valid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// per the specified types for the operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((ValidTyMask != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dxilopbuilder-cpp-/#a3fe8fcf1f03e5da864eb86be303a3216a9045349aadd51459c6dbe4f3b1c43217">OverloadKind::UNDEFINED</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (ValidTyMask &amp; (uint16&#95;t)Kind) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#a22a5df2ccfebeb3582950ac081af7057">makeOpError</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#ac64683c1985c78d81b50819a0b733f48">OpCode</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid overload type&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform necessary checks to ensure Opcode is valid in the targeted shader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// kind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;size&#95;t&gt; StIndexOrErr =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a3030fa8e5d4a78aef7c5a7fa00294ac6">getPropIndex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(Prop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/opcodeproperty/#aef5a9770dd5d3385ac6d10b1dcca31f5">Stages</a>), DXILVersion);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!StIndexOrErr.has&#95;value())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint16&#95;t ValidShaderKindMask = Prop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/opcodeproperty/#aef5a9770dd5d3385ac6d10b1dcca31f5">Stages</a>&#91;&#42;StIndexOrErr&#93;.ValidStages;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"></CodeLine>
